long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Run your TrainerRoad workouts entirely in the browser. 

This plugin adds a button that lets you run your workouts in the browser instead of the TrainerRoad app.

Once the workout is loaded click on Power, Heart rate, and Cadence to add pair sensors.


NOTE: This is software under development. Not everyrhing works yet. Most importantly the workout will NOT be recorded in TrainerRoad on completion at this time. Also ERG does not work yet.
